mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_idx, e.emp_pw, e.dept_id, d.parent_dept_id, CONCAT('ROLE_', d.dept_name) AS dept_name, CONCAT('ROLE_', c.common_type) AS position_name FROM employee e LEFT OUTER JOIN department d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT OUTER JOIN common c ON e.`position` = c.common_idx WHERE e.emp_idx=#{param1}
SELECT d.dept_id, d.parent_dept_id , CONCAT('ROLE_', d.dept_name) AS dept_name FROM department d WHERE d.parent_dept_id is not null AND d.dept_id != #{param1};
